name: Gravity bot (itch) (ThomasO02)
description:
Gravity Bot is an arcade game where you play as a little robot that can walk against gravity. Overcome the puzzles inside the factory and beat the challenges at each level.

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys to move up, down left and right (you can also use WASD)
  • Press space to jump
  • You can use R to reset the level or press the in-game reset button
  • To pause, press P or use the in-game button

Developed by:

  • Oscar Oosterling
  • Luuk Nguyen
  • Mitchell Boot
  • Thomas Otte
